config.worktreePick.showRevealInSystemEx: Show the "Reveal in the system explorer" button on the results of "Find Worktree"
config.worktreePick.showCopy.description: Show the "Copy" button on the results of "Find Worktree"
config.worktreePick.showAddToWorkspace.d: Show the "Add folder to workspace" button on the results of "Find Worktree"
config.worktreePick.copyTemplate.descrip:
The template used for the copy operation in the "Find Worktree" list

Available variables are
- `$HASH` the hash of the current commit in the worktree
- `$MESSAGE` the commit message in the worktree
- `$FULL_PATH` the full path of the worktree
- `$BASE_NAME` the folder name of the worktree
- `$LABEL` the display name of the worktree, such as branch name or tag

eg: `git merge $LABEL`. Default is `$LABEL`.
config.worktreePick.showCheckout.descrip: Show the "Checkout" button on the results of "Find Worktree"
config.worktreePick.showViewHistory.desc: Show the "View Git history" button on the results of "Find Worktree"

config.gitHistoryExtension.enum.vscode.g: VSCode Git â‡„ Built-in Git graph
config.workspacePathFormat.description:
Custom template for displaying the workspace path. You can use the following variables in the template:

- `$FULL_PATH`: The full path of the repository.
- `$BASE_NAME`: The folder name of the repository.

Example:
`$BASE_NAME - $FULL_PATH` will be displayed as `my-project - /Users/username/projects/my-project`.

config.branchPick.showDeleteBranch.descr: Show the "Delete Branch" button on the results of "Pick Branch"
config.promptDeleteBranchAfterWorktreeDe: Prompt to delete the branch previously associated with the worktree after its deletion
config.worktreeCopyPatterns.description: Glob patterns for files to be copied when creating a new worktree, referring to [glob patterns](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns).
config.worktreeCopyIgnores.description: Glob patterns for files to be excluded when copying files to a new worktree, referring to [glob patterns](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns).
config.checkoutIgnoreOtherWorktree.descr: When enabled, the state of other worktrees is ignored when switching branches, allowing multiple worktrees to use the same branch.
config.branchPick.showRenameBranch.descr: Show the "Rename Branch" button on the results of "Pick Branch"
config.treeView.toSCM.description: Display views in the Source Control container
config.worktreePathTemplate.description: Template for the worktree path. Available variables: $BASE_PATH (repo root).
config.worktreeSubdirectoryTemplate.desc: Template for worktree subdirectory names. Available variables: $BASE_NAME (repo folder name), $INDEX (incrementing number). Cannot contain characters: / \ : * ? " < > |
